name: NSCompoundPredicate
desc: A specialized predicate that evaluates logical combinations of other predicates.

items.name: init(andPredicateWithSubpredicates: [NSPredicate])
items.desc: Returns a new predicate that you form using an AND operation on the predicates in a specified array.

items.name: init(notPredicateWithSubpredicate: NSPredicate)
items.desc: Returns a new predicate that you form using a NOT operation on a specified predicate.

items.name: init(orPredicateWithSubpredicates: [NSPredicate])
items.desc: Returns a new predicate that you form using an OR operation on the predicates in a specified array.

items.name: init(type: NSCompoundPredicate.LogicalType, subpredicates: [NSPredicate])
items.desc: Returns the receiver that a specified type initializes using predicates from a specified array.

items.name: init?(coder: NSCoder)
items.desc: Creates a predicate by decoding from the coder you specify.

items.name: var compoundPredicateType: NSCompoundPredicate.LogicalType
items.desc: The predicate type for the receiver.

items.name: enum NSCompoundPredicate.LogicalType
items.desc: Constants that describe the possible types of a compound predicate.
